alert.note: Alert for Humacao; Juncos; Las Piedras; Naguabo (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 02 at 1:26PM ADT until July 02 at 3:30PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON FOR HUMACAO, JUNCOS, LAS PIEDRAS AND NAGUABO MUNICIPALITIES... At 1226 PM AST, Doppler radar estimated up to 5 inches of rain across the warning area. Also, the USGS rain gauge (NGKP4) at Rio Blanco indicated that the river is out of its bank. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Humacao, Las Piedras, Naguabo, Juncos, Anton Ruiz, La Fermina, Punta Santiago, Roosevelt Roads, Pena Pobre, Rio Blanco, Bajandas, Pueblito Del Rio, El Mango, Duque, Candelero Arriba, Comunas, Lomas and Daguao. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
